Traits.Name: Hallucination's Embrace
Traits.Content: Ending can create vivid, shared hallucinations in a 60-foot radius. Creatures within that area must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become incapacitated until the end of their next turn, as they experience visions of their final moments.

Traits.Name: Aura of Despair
Traits.Content: Creatures within 10 feet of Ending have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened and charmed.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If Ending fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Ending makes two attacks with Dreadful Touch and one attack with Shattered Reality.

Actions.Name: Dreadful Touch
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 9 (1d10 + 3) necrotic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of their next turn as they are overwhelmed by visions of impending doom.

Actions.Name: Shattered Reality
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 9 (1d10 + 3) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn, experiencing a fleeting glimpse of their own demise.

Actions.Name: Hallucinatory Cataclysm
Actions.Content: Area of effect: 30-foot radius centered on Ending. Each creature within range must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 33 (7d10) psychic damage, or half as much on a successful save. Creatures who fail the save also have disadvantage on the next attack roll they make as they are haunted by terrifying visions.

LegendaryActions.Name: Veil of Despair (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: Ending shrouds itself in a veil of darkness, granting it advantage on the next Dexterity saving throw made against an attack. This ability reflects the creature's connection to the fear of death and the unknown.

LegendaryActions.Name: Shattered Reality (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: Ending can use the Shattered Reality action.

LegendaryActions.Name: Time's Lament (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: Ending targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage as memories of their life flash before their eyes and they become incapacitated until the end of their next turn.
